mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Merkel, George
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: New Richmond, Clermont Co., Ohio [New Richmond, Clermont County, Ohio]
New Richmond, Clermont Co., Ohio [New Richmond, Clermont County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Merkel, George Patient Age: 26. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left leg (internal condyle of femur) and gun shot flesh wound right thigh lower third. Location Wounded: Cloyd's Mountain [Virginia]. Date Wounded: 1864/05/09. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Mustered out and discharged from the service.
